elements.label: Your health data is required if you would like to participate in the Challenges. Please provide us with your permission to access your health data.
We look forward to seeing you on the next challenge : )
We look forward to seeing you on the next challenge :)
The amount of energy created from your steps is enough to power up a light bulb for 48 days!
That's enough distance to circle 2 times around the entire Malaysian border!
That's enough calories to keep a tiger alive for 66 days!

Every participant has a chance to earn the rewards from this challenge. The better you do, the higher your chances.
 Your name will be entered into the reward drawing system, and if you are indeed a lucky winner, we'll contact you directly through your email.
 Please stay tuned!

Join this timed challenge for a chance to win one of our awesome rewards!
 Every participant has a chance to earn the rewards from this challenge. The better you do in this challenge, the higher your chances.
 At the end of the challenge, your name will be entered into the reward drawing system, and if you are indeed a lucky winner, we'll contact you directly through your email.What are you waiting for?
